This original soundtrack contains 16 themes created by Alexander Ahura specifically for Train Valley 2.
------------------------------------------
1. My Lovely Train
2. While My Bouzouki Gently Scratches
3. Magic Railroad
4. The Wagon Wheels
5. Far Mountains
6. Western Fog
7. That Is the Way
8. The Heart of Travel
9. Romantic Station
10. Traveling
11. Pack Your Travel Bag
12. Electrification
13. New Way
14. Make Progress
15. Long Road
16. Main Menu Theme

Total playtime: 39:00. MP3 (256 kbps).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600M or better / ATi Radeon 2400 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
